item.title: About me
item.author: abhishekarya102@gmail.com (Abhishek Arya)
item.description: img { max-width:300px; max-height:200px; width: auto; height: auto; } My name is Abhishek Arya. Some things about me, including but not limited to, love for computers : I absolutely hate small talks and avoid them completely, no offence. ðŸ™‚ I am a typical neighbourhood geek - vsauce, xkcd, Cyanide & Happiness, watching rocket launches when I’m bored, paradoxes and thought experiments. I am on a journey to discover my true passion in computer sciences and technology, which hopefully I can find somewhere here on the internet.
